description: Not only are these dried blueberries easy to make, they are also full of flavour. Perfect in a trail mix, yoghurt, muffins and pancakes.
keywords: Finger food,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Baking,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Dried Blueberries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 120°C/100°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Spread blueberries evenly into a single layer on tray. Bake for 2 hours, or until dried. Store in an airtight container.
